fast3d.complex.light

Class AmbientLight

  • java.lang.Object
    • fast3d.complex.light.AmbientLight
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Light

    public class AmbientLight
extends java.lang.Object
implements Light
    ambient light means background-light or the minimum light that is even in the shadows
    Author:
    Tim Trense

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      Color lightColor
      the color of the ambient light (should be for realistic scenarios some dark gray)

      constructs some ambient lighting with the given color

      calculates the visible color for the given illuminatable;

    • Method Detail

      • illuminate

        public Color illuminate(Illuminatable c)
        Description copied from interface: Light
        calculates the visible color for the given illuminatable;
        the visible color is the color of the pixels on the screen for the given renderable
        Specified by:
        illuminate in interface Light
        Parameters:
        c - the illuminatable giving the data of its surface
        Returns:
        the visible color to draw the illuminatable in if no other light is used
